Title: The Devil's Mark
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Toni Graphia (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Lotte Verbeek, Bill Paterson
Plot: Claire and Geillis stand trial for witchcraft; Claire learns a secret about Geillis' past.
